Title: Casper: A Spirited Beginning
Writer: Joseph Oriolo (book), Seymour Reit (book), Thomas McCluskey (story), Rob Kerchner (story), Jymn Magon (screenplay), Thomas Hart (screenplay)
Actors: Steve Guttenberg, Lori Loughlin, Rodney Dangerfield, Michael McKean
Plot: Casper accidentally finds himself in the world of the living after failing to show up for ghost training and befriended a young boy who teaches him the ways of a ghost, while a ruler from the other world attempts to bring him back.
